title: Did a Grandmother with AK-47 Save Cops Being Attacked by a Street Gang?
subtitle: Reports detailed an incident wherein a 79-year-old grandma armed with an AK-47 saved the lives of two LAPD officers attacked by gang members.
author: David Emery
vclaim: 79-year-old Wendy Robinson of Los Angeles came to the rescue of two LAPD officers with her AK-47 assault rifle when they were attacked by gang members.
